subject: Flock intros
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

Hi Detective DeWitt, 

Introducing you to...

Randy Zobel - Commercial Sales
David Johnson - Territory Sales Manager, Oregon 

Randy and David - our wonderful partners at Eugene PD wanted to get your contact info to pass along to other LE agencies and businesses who are interested in partnering with Flock too. Thanks all!
	
 
Caroline Fraher
Territory Sales Manager



 https://www.instagram.com/flocksafety/ 
 <https://cdn.gifo.wisestamp.com/s/rfm1/108062/26/trans.png>  310-844-3659 call/text <tel:310-844-3659call/text>    <https://cdn.gifo.wisestamp.com/s/rfw4/108062/26/trans.png>  flocksafety.com 

 <https://cdn.gifo.wisestamp.com/s/rfcustom/108062/26/trans.png>  caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com 

	
 

	
 https://link.flocksafety.com/40mzzZB 

	
 	 
 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/QNLPvRoWrGG.png>
